Text: Great Pick!!!!Love this Film.There are so Many Famous English Actors in this..
One of my favorite movies,but I must say ( judging by the pics ) that I'm disappointed at the quality of transfer and conversion to blu-ray.Thanks anyway...

@mirrormaster82 - it is what it is.  According to my eyes, as well as every disc analysis I've read so far, given the state of film stocks and opticals available to Boorman at the time, this is a completely accurate transfer and encoding of the original film to BR.
